criterion: Provides references to official guidelines from ASCO and NCCN.
Does not mention the importance of considering family history and risk factors when counseling patients with BRCA1 mutations.
Uses technical and professional language suitable for genetics counseling students.
Does not provide any references to standard textbooks from counseling certification programs.
Provides clear and concise information about BRCA1 mutations and their implications for genetic counseling.
Does not mention the importance of genetic testing and counseling for patients with BRCA1 mutations.
Takes into account the user's request for references to official guidelines from ASCO and NCCN.
Provides a balanced view of the benefits and risks associated with genetic testing and counseling for BRCA1 mutations.
Does not provide any information about the prevalence of BRCA1 mutations in the general population.
Uses clear and concise language to explain complex genetic concepts.
